data.text: Worst hotel ever the host is cheap tried to charge me to use hot water for the kettle then hide the kettle the next day the hotel is dirty and full of ants and bugs we got bitten my feet are swallowed from all the bites not only that the manager refused to give us our money back after the ants everywhere and bugs service was horrible there are way better Hotels in Izmir do not go here overcharging for everything dirty rooms and she is incredibly cheap she refills the shampoo and gives you watered down conditioner  complains if u get the towels dirty told me this is not a 5 star hotel you are just here to sleep all the review on google are a lie ants and bugs everywhere even on the beds if I could give this hotel zero stars I would
data.title: Worst hotel in my life
